product_summary: Lobby Code is a powerful AI-powered coding assistant that helps developers of all levels code faster and more efficiently. With Lobby Code, you can generate code, debug errors, and refactor your code with just a few keystrokes. Lobby Code also provides real-time feedback and suggestions, so you can always be sure that your code is up to par.
product_pros: Integrates with your favorite IDEs and code editors
product_cons: May not be suitable for all coding tasks
Can be difficult to learn how to use
May not be able to handle complex coding tasks
May not be able to integrate with all IDEs and code editors

product_usecases.details: Lobby Code can generate code for a variety of programming languages, including Java, Python, JavaScript, and C++.
Lobby Code can help you debug errors in your code by identifying the source of the error and suggesting fixes.
Lobby Code can help you refactor your code to make it more efficient and maintainable.
Lobby Code provides real-time feedback and suggestions on your code as you type, so you can always be sure that your code is up to par.

product_usecases.case: Integration with IDEs and code editors
product_usecases.details: Lobby Code integrates with your favorite IDEs and code editors, so you can use it without having to leave your workflow.

product_toolfor.details: Lobby Code is a great tool for developers of all levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.
Lobby Code is a great tool for teams of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises.
Lobby Code is a great tool for companies of all industries, from software development to finance to healthcare.
Lobby Code is a great tool for individuals and businesses of all sizes.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who wants to code faster and more efficiently
product_toolfor.details: Lobby Code is a great tool for anyone who wants to code faster and more efficiently.

product_pricing: Lobby Code is available for a free 7-day trial. After the trial, pricing starts at $99/month for the Individual plan and $99/seat/month for the Team plan.
